CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In an attempt to further improve the performance of the PCDTBT - based polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) , we have synthesized a selenophene analogue of PCDTBT , namely , PCDSeBT , in which diselenienylbenzothiadiazole ( DSeBT ) monomer alternately flanks with a 2,7-carbazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDTBT |
| PSCs |
| selenophene analogue of PCDTBT |
| PCDSeBT |
| diselenienylbenzothiadiazole (DSeBT) |
| 2,7-carbazole unit |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| PCDSeBT |

| 2,7-carbazole unit |
